grid.title: MAC Activity Work Code Rate Config
grid.sqlSelect: SELECT MWCRC.ID, MWCRC.EndUserID, CAST(C.Organization_Id AS VARCHAR(2))+' - '+C.CUSTOMER_NAME AS EndUserName, MWCRC.WorkCodeID, CAST(i.ORGANIZATION_ID AS VARCHAR(2)) + ' - ' + i.name AS WorkCodeName, MWCRC.Rate, MWCRC.IsActive FROM MAC_WorkCodeRate_Config MWCRC (nolock) LEFT JOIN dbo.Customers C (nolock) on C.customer_id = MWCRC.EndUserID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT i.item_id, i.name, i.ORGANIZATION_ID FROM dbo.items i INNER JOIN dbo.lookups item_type ON i.item_type_id = item_type.lookup_id WHERE item_type.code = 'hours' ) i ON MWCRC.WorkCodeID = i.item_id
grid.sqlUpdate: UPDATE MAC_WorkCodeRate_Config SET EndUserID = @EndUserID, WorkCodeID = @WorkCodeID, Rate = @Rate, ModifiedOn = GETUTCDATE(), ModifiedBy = @__UserId__, IsActive = @IsActive WHERE ID = @ID

column.label: End User
column.dataSelect: SELECT DISTINCT TOP 100 PERCENT P.END_USER_ID AS EndUserID, CAST(C.Organization_Id AS VARCHAR(2))+' - '+C.CUSTOMER_NAME AS EndUserName FROM dbo.PROJECTS P (nolock) inner join dbo.Lookups_Active_V LP (nolock) on LP.LOOKUP_ID = P.PROJECT_TYPE_ID inner join dbo.CUSTOMERS C (nolock) on P.END_USER_ID = C.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE ISNULL(C.ext_customer_id,'') NOT LIKE 'OLD%' AND LP.type_code = 'job_type' and LP.lookup_code = 'service_account' AND C.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' AND C.end_user_parent_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY EndUserName, EndUserID

column.label: Work Code
column.dataSelect: SELECT i.item_id AS WorkCodeID, CAST(i.ORGANIZATION_ID AS VARCHAR(2)) + ' - ' + i.name AS WorkCodeName FROM dbo.items i INNER JOIN dbo.lookups item_type ON i.item_type_id = item_type.lookup_id WHERE item_type.code = 'hours' AND (@EndUserID IS NULL OR i.ORGANIZATION_ID = (SELECT ORGANIZATION_ID FROM dbo.CUSTOMERS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = @EndUserID))
